title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 4 - How to Patch a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Demonstrate how to patch a lay flat header pipe.
subtasks: Cut the lay flat header pipe precisely over the leak.
Use a coupling or bob splice fitting to join the cut sections.
Secure the clamp on both sides of the pipe for easy access.
Insert the fitting into each end of the cut pipe sections.
Align and push the pipe sections over the fitting.
Apply Vaseline or vegetable oil to facilitate sliding.
Position the pipe clamps past the barbs.
Tighten the clamps with a screwdriver.
Test the repair by turning on the water.
